desc.en: Genryumon's executive officer, Mina, is always working hard to maintain safety in Shanhaijing. Her actions set an exemplary standard for others to follow, but there seems to be something unique about her activities.
desc.jp: Genryumon's executive officer, Mina, is always working hard to maintain safety in Shanhaijing. Her actions set an exemplary standard for others to follow, but there seems to be something unique about her activities.
desc.zh_cn: {cn玄龙门}的运行部长{cf美奈}为了维持{sn山海经}的治安，总是不分昼夜地努力。虽然是值得视为模范的行为，但行为本身似乎又反映出某种独特的偏好。

hobby.jp: 映画鑑賞（主にハードボイルド系）
hobby.zh_cn_jp: 电影鉴赏（冷硬派系为主）
hobby.zh_cn_tw: 欣赏电影（以冷硬派电影为主）
hobby.zh_cn_cn: 电影鉴赏（冷硬派系为主）

realname.zh_cn: 不变的平凡 钢琴版

hobby.zh_cn_jp: 电影鉴赏（冷硬派系为主）
hobby.zh_cn_tw: 欣赏电影（以冷硬派电影为主）
hobby.zh_cn_cn: 电影鉴赏（冷硬派系为主）

desc.en: Saya visits her regular ramen shop and is asked to make improvements to a new ramen with a foul smell. Saya adds a special spicy sauce that eventually becomes a huge hit among spicy food fanatics.
desc.jp: Saya visits her regular ramen shop and is asked to make improvements to a new ramen with a foul smell. Saya adds a special spicy sauce that eventually becomes a huge hit among spicy food fanatics.
desc.zh_cn: {cf沙耶}去了常去的拉面店，店家请她协助改善新推出的拉面味道太浓的问题。{cf沙耶}在拉面里添加特制酱料让味道减轻，此举成功获得了辣味狂热者们的赞赏。

realname.zh_cn: 不变的平凡 钢琴版

desc.en: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.jp: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.zh_cn: 有些时候，停下来饮杯茶也不错。举例/联想：Cherry Merry Berry
举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

name.en: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)
name.jp: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)
name.zh_cn: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)
糖葫芦 in 梦幻岛

desc.en: Small Shun spends time strolling around the Black Tortoise Promenade with Sensei under her excuse of trying to "look for Shun."
desc.jp: Small Shun spends time strolling around the Black Tortoise Promenade with Sensei under her excuse of trying to "look for Shun."
desc.zh_cn: 年幼的{cf旬}自称是小{cf旬}，以「寻找{cf旬}」为理由，与老师一起逛了{sn山海经}的各处。

name.en: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)
name.jp: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)
name.zh_cn: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)

realname.zh_cn: 不变的平凡 钢琴版

desc.en: Shun, an instructor of the Plum Blossom Garden, drinks Saya's rejuvenation elixir and accidentally reverts back to her young self. However, she now has the body and demeanor of a child. Now she's causing all kinds of mischief...
desc.jp: Shun, an instructor of the Plum Blossom Garden, drinks Saya's rejuvenation elixir and accidentally reverts back to her young self. However, she now has the body and demeanor of a child. Now she's causing all kinds of mischief...
desc.zh_cn: {cn梅花园}的教官{cf旬}，喝了从{cf沙耶}那里得到的「回春秘药」，回到了小时候的样子！随着身体的变化，心也变年幼的她，在{sn山海经}的各处引起了各种麻烦……！？

desc.en: Shun, an instructor of the Plum Blossom Garden, drinks Saya's rejuvenation elixir and accidentally reverts back to her young self. However, she now has the body and demeanor of a child. Now she's causing all kinds of mischief...
desc.jp: Shun, an instructor of the Plum Blossom Garden, drinks Saya's rejuvenation elixir and accidentally reverts back to her young self. However, she now has the body and demeanor of a child. Now she's causing all kinds of mischief...
desc.zh_cn: {cn梅花园}的教官{cf旬}，喝了从{cf沙耶}那里得到的「回春秘药」，回到了小时候的样子！随着身体的变化，心也变年幼的她，在{sn山海经}的各处引起了各种麻烦……！？

desc.en: After Shun returns to her original body, Sensei visits Plum Blossom Garden to check up on her. Shun goes back to her childish whining when she sees Sensei.
desc.jp: After Shun returns to her original body, Sensei visits Plum Blossom Garden to check up on her. Shun goes back to her childish whining when she sees Sensei.
desc.zh_cn: {cf旬}顺利地回到了原本的身体。后来，{cf旬}见到了来{cn梅花园}参观的老师，一边利用自己的身高优势，一边像孩子般向老师撒娇。

desc.en: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.jp: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.zh_cn: 有些时候，停下来饮杯茶也不错。举例/联想：Cherry Merry Berry

desc.en: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.jp: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.zh_cn: 在大起大落的事情里外，我们总需要一点闲适的时间来放松自己的神经。举例/联想：Lemonade Diary、Nesno wons；特征是较为温柔。

name.jp: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)
name.zh_cn: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)

desc.en: Sensei visits Genryumon to find a solution for the "10,000-year-old Ginseng controversy" surrounding the Black Tortoise Promenade. However, evidence is presented against the Black Tortoise Promenade, and everyone puts their heads together to solve the problem.
desc.jp: Sensei visits Genryumon to find a solution for the "10,000-year-old Ginseng controversy" surrounding the Black Tortoise Promenade. However, evidence is presented against the Black Tortoise Promenade, and everyone puts their heads together to solve the problem.
desc.zh_cn: 老师为了解决围绕着{cn玄武商会}发生的「万年参争议」拜访{cn玄龙门}。不过随着对{cn玄武商会}不利的证据浮上台面，大家为了解决难题一起集思广益。

realname.zh_cn: 不变的平凡 钢琴版

name.en: Dragon & Tortoise, Working Together for a Better Future
name.jp: Dragon & Tortoise, Working Together for a Better Future
name.zh_cn: 龙武同舟～心中描绘的，是同一个{cf未来}～

desc.en: A precarious balance had existed between the Black Tortoise Promenade and Genryumon in Shanhaijing when an incident throws that balance awry.... Will Sensei and the students be able to prevent the situation from plunging into chaos?
desc.jp: A precarious balance had existed between the Black Tortoise Promenade and Genryumon in Shanhaijing when an incident throws that balance awry.... Will Sensei and the students be able to prevent the situation from plunging into chaos?
desc.zh_cn:
重视传统的{cn玄龙门}与尊崇进化的{cn玄武商会}。
彼此相反的{sn山海经}两大派系维持着危险的平衡。
某天，{cn玄武商会}被加诸了莫须有的怀疑──
究竟一行人能否克服这个危机呢？

name.en: Dragon & Tortoise, Working Together for a Better Future

desc.en: To solve the case, Sensei and the group prepare a trap. However, someone had been watching the whole time...
desc.jp: To solve the case, Sensei and the group prepare a trap. However, someone had been watching the whole time...
desc.zh_cn: 为了解决事件，老师一行人准备了「陷阱」。不过这一切都被某个人看在眼里……

desc.en: The 105th track in Blue Archive OST, especially known for usages with the students from Arius Satellite School.

desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST的第105首曲子，尤其用于阿里乌斯(奥利斯)分校的学生。

desc.en: Sensei and the group successfully subdue the smugglers, but come to realize that they are merely pawns serving the mastermind working behind the scenes.
desc.jp: Sensei and the group successfully subdue the smugglers, but come to realize that they are merely pawns serving the mastermind working behind the scenes.
desc.zh_cn: 老师一行人成功压制住万年参走私贩。不过他们也只是某个人的爪牙而已，也因此揭露了还有另一股实权势力存在的事实。

desc.en: Thus, the 10,000-year-old Ginseng case that long troubled the Shanhaijing area, is resolved. Yet, the resentment between the two factions remains strong...

desc.zh_cn: 就这样，撼动{sn山海经}的万年参外流事件告一段落。不过还留有未解决的疙瘩……
